root['Kit']['Basic #2']['Desc'].new_value: Aglaea and Garmentmaker launch a Joint ATK on the target, respectively dealing Lightning DMG equal to [100|140]% of Aglaea's ATK and [100|140]% of Garmentmaker's ATK to the target. Also, deal Lightning DMG equal to [45|56]% of Aglaea's ATK and [45|56]% of Garmentmaker's ATK to adjacent targets. 'Slash by a Thousandfold Kiss' cannot recover Skill Points.
root['Kit']['Basic #2']['Desc'].old_value: Aglaea and Garmentmaker launch a Joint ATK on the target, respectively dealing Lightning DMG equal to [100|140]% of Aglaea's ATK and [100|140]% of Garmentmaker's ATK to the target. Also, deal Lightning DMG equal to [40|56]% of Aglaea's ATK and [40|56]% of Garmentmaker's ATK to adjacent targets. 'Slash by a Thousandfold Kiss' cannot recover Skill Points.

root['Kit']['Skill']['Desc'].new_value: Restores HP to Garmentmaker by [25|50]% of its Max HP. If Garmentmaker is absent, summons the memosprite Garmentmaker, and this unit immediately takes action.
root['Kit']['Skill']['Desc'].old_value: Restores HP to Garmentmaker by [25|50]% of its Max HP. If Garmentmaker is absent, summons the memosprite Garmentmaker and this unit immediately takes action.

root['Kit']['Talent']['Desc'].new_value: The memosprite Garmentmaker has an initial SPD equal to 35% of Aglaea's SPD and a Max HP equal to [44|66]% of Aglaea's Max HP plus [180|720]. While Garmentmaker is on the field, Aglaea's attacks inflict the target with the 'Seam Stitch' state. After attacking enemies in the 'Seam Stitch' state, further deals Additional DMG equal to [12|30]% of Aglaea's ATK. 'Seam Stitch' only takes effect on the most recently inflicted target.
root['Kit']['Talent']['Desc'].old_value: The memosprite Garmentmaker has an initial SPD equal to 35% of Aglaea's base SPD and a Max HP equal to [44|66]% of Aglaea's Max HP plus [180|720]. While Garmentmaker is on the field, Aglaea's attacks inflict the target with the 'Seam Stitch' state. After attacking enemies in the 'Seam Stitch' state, further deals Additional DMG equal to [12|30]% of Aglaea's ATK. 'Seam Stitch' only takes effect on the most recently inflicted target.

root['Memosprite']['Kit']['Talent']['Des.new_value: After attacking an enemy afflicted with 'Seam Stitch,' increases this unit's SPD by [44|55], stacking up to 6 time(s). During Garmentmaker's turn, automatically uses 'Thorned Snare,' prioritizing enemies under the 'Seam Stitch' state.
root['Memosprite']['Kit']['Talent']['Des.old_value: After attacking an enemy afflicted with 'Seam Stitch,' increases this unit's SPD by [40|50], stacking up to 6 time(s). During Garmentmaker's turn, automatically uses 'Thorned Snare,' prioritizing enemies under the 'Seam Stitch' state.

root['Eidolons']['1']['Desc'].new_value: When Aglaea or Garmentmaker takes action, the DMG dealt by Aglaea and Garmentmaker ignores 15% of the target's DEF. This effect stacks up to 20 time(s) and lasts until any unit, other than Aglaea or Garmentmaker, actively uses an ability.
root['Eidolons']['1']['Desc'].old_value: When Aglaea or Garmentmaker takes action, the DMG dealt by Aglaea and Garmentmaker ignores 14% of the target's DEF. This effect stacks up to 3 time(s) and lasts until any unit, other than Aglaea or Garmentmaker, actively uses an ability.

root['Eidolons']['2']['Desc'].new_value: Enemies afflicted with 'Seam Stitch' take 14% increased DMG. After Aglaea or Garmentmaker attacks this target, Aglaea additionally regenerates 3 Energy.
root['Eidolons']['2']['Desc'].old_value: Enemies afflicted with 'Seam Stitch' take 8% increased DMG. After Aglaea or Garmentmaker attacks this target, Aglaea additionally regenerates 20 Energy.
